backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend files including App.tsx and index.html.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-control headers, canonical URL, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with domain redirect, URL cleanup, navigation, marketing sections, and hostname footer indicator.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and related state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since no backend queries exist.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind OKLCH warm color palette with typography tweaks and utility layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point mounting App with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH colors, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project reset state, noting deployment URL issues and two existing features for republishing and adding a hostname indicator.
